name: Fixstars
tag_list: multicore, opencl, cuda, h-264, encoder, ydl, linux, porting, optimization, yellow-dog
overview:
Fixstars provides full solutions that harness the high computing performance of multi-core technology. We provide expertise in migrating your computer processes to multicore platforms. Our strengths are Linux Enterprise solutions, image processing and computing simulations for a wide range of industries worldwide.

Software Products: Yellow Dog Enterprise Linux (YDEL) Based on the renown OS â€œYellow Dog Linuxâ€, Fixstars provides enterprise support for IT Linux infrastructure that takes advantage of multicore servers. We have a track record of reliability, availability and serviceability.

CodecSys CodecSys is a software base H.264 encoder. It enables real time encoding with the latest image compressing technology while maintaining high image quality required for HD video. The system has blazing encoding speeds due to its internal IBM Cell/B.E. accelerator. It is available for video creation for IPTV, Blu-ray authoring studios and digitalization of media archives.

Professional Services Our service and support helps you drastically accelerate your computing processes. We free your resources and build your capabilities to give you the ability to generate additional revenue and cut costs. Our services reduce servers, maintenance, space and electricity usage.

Consulting and Profiling We analyze the original code or pseudo-code that is to be transplanted, identifying deficiencies and bottlenecks in computation, and determine transplant policy and hardware.

Porting and Optimization We port and optimize original code to multi-core processors in order to utilize cores efficiently. We use key indicators as parallelization and SIMD.
